overview: Mr. Thomas Duncan is the President and Founder of Blue Bite, LLC. Tom is responsible for establishing the growth vision for Blue Bite as well as leading the charge in the fields of new product development and sales. From 2006-2007, he worked on the equities, foreign exchange, and credit desks at GFI Group on Wall Street. Tom holds a B.S. degree in Finance and Marketing from The Stern School of Business at New York University.
